overview:
Dror Shalev, Chief Technology Officer at Droid Security, is an experienced Internet and security technologist. Prior to DroidSecurity, Shalev managed the SmartDefense Research Center at Check Point Software (NASDAQ: CHKP), responsible for vulnerability research, solutions for vulnerabilities, as well as industry relations for leading vendors including Microsoft Security Response Center, Adobe , Zone Labs , Secunia and iDefense.

Prior to Check Point, Shalev worked at Finjan and DataSec on the development and design of Internet security systems, and was co-founder and CTO of BmyPC, an Internet desktop application.
